adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: Bedrock-1

model.title: Model
model.description: Model name. Refer to [Bedrock's documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/bedrock/latest/userguide/models-supported.html) for the list of available models.

aws_access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: Provide your AWS Access Key ID. Leave empty if using AWS Profile or IAM role.

aws_secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: Provide your AWS Secret Access Key. Leave empty if using AWS Profile or IAM role.

region_name.title: AWS Region Name
region_name.description: Provide the AWS Region name where the service is running. Eg. us-east-1

aws_profile_name.title: AWS Profile Name
aws_profile_name.description: AWS SSO profile name for authentication. Use this instead of access keys when using AWS SSO. Example: dev-profile

model_id.title: Application Inference Profile ARN
model_id.description: Optional ARN for Application Inference Profile for cost tracking. Example: arn:aws:bedrock:us-east-1:000000000000:application-inference-profile/xxxx

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, the maximum possible differs from model to model.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.

enable_thinking.title: Enable Extended Thinking
enable_thinking.description: Enhance reasoning for complex tasks with step-by-step transparency. Available only for Claude 3.7 Sonnet.

budget_tokens.title: Thinking Budget Tokens
budget_tokens.description: Sets the max tokens for Claude's internal reasoning when thinking is enabled
